item.title: The Slow Death of Adobe Flash
item.description:
The Slow Death of Adobe Flash

AUG 2015 Posted by David Hagy | Blog Adobe flash has been in the news lately with the new exploits announced and many tech blogs stating Adobe Flash needs to be removed for good. And while this is good advice to delete and forget Flash it is not that easy for businesses.

item.title: YouTube Music is here, and it's a game changer
item.description:
YouTube Music is here, and it's a game changer

YouTube is first and foremost a video portal, the world's largest and most popular online collection of moving images. But it's also a search engine, the world's second largest, trailing only its parent company, Google.
